creator: anon2k@hotmail.com
text:
make for ss_expr_scan.c dies with with "flex: unknown flag 'P'".  Native flex 
in Digital UNIX 4.0g does not support this flag.  Apache 2.0 apparently 
requires a flex that does (e.g., gnu flex).  It would be nice if configure 
would check for this dependency.

creator: slive@apache.org
text:
You shouldn't actually need flex.  There was a slight error creating the
tarball.  If you just "touch" the relevant files so that make will stay
away from them, you should be ok.
